title: Google\Cloud\Security\PrivateCA\V1\Certificate
name: Certificate
description:
A [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] corresponds to a signed X.509 certificate issued by a [CertificateAuthority][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CertificateAuthority].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. The resource name for this [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] in the format projects/*/locations/*/caPools/*/certificates/*.

params.name: data.pem_csr
params.description: Immutable. A pem-encoded X.509 certificate signing request (CSR).

params.name: data.config
params.description: Immutable. A description of the certificate and key that does not require X.509 or ASN.1.

params.name: data.issuer_certificate_authority
params.description: Output only. The resource name of the issuing [CertificateAuthority][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CertificateAuthority] in the format projects/*/locations/*/caPools/*/certificateAuthorities/*.

params.name: data.lifetime
params.description: Required. Immutable. The desired lifetime of a certificate. Used to create the "not_before_time" and "not_after_time" fields inside an X.509 certificate. Note that the lifetime may be truncated if it would extend past the life of any certificate authority in the issuing chain.

params.name: data.certificate_template
params.description: Immutable. The resource name for a [CertificateTemplate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CertificateTemplate] used to issue this certificate, in the format projects/*/locations/*/certificateTemplates/*. If this is specified, the caller must have the necessary permission to use this template. If this is omitted, no template will be used. This template must be in the same location as the [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate].

params.name: data.subject_mode
params.description: Immutable. Specifies how the [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate]'s identity fields are to be decided. If this is omitted, the DEFAULT subject mode will be used.

params.name: data.revocation_details
params.description: Output only. Details regarding the revocation of this [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate]. This [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] is considered revoked if and only if this field is present.

params.name: data.pem_certificate
params.description: Output only. The pem-encoded, signed X.509 certificate.

params.name: data.certificate_description
params.description: Output only. A structured description of the issued X.509 certificate.

params.name: data.pem_certificate_chain
params.description: Output only. The chain that may be used to verify the X.509 certificate. Expected to be in issuer-to-root order according to RFC 5246.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The time at which this [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] was created.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The time at which this [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] was updated.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Optional. Labels with user-defined metadata.
